headline: Trump and MBS Tout $1 Trillion Pledge as Details Remain Elusive
summary: (Bloomberg) -- President Donald Trump and Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman touted a pledge for $1 trillion in commercial deals in Riyadh on Tuesday, a staggering figure that doesn’t quite stand up to scrutiny.Most Read from BloombergAs Coastline Erodes, One California City Considers ‘Retreat Now’A New Central Park Amenity, Tailored to Its East Harlem NeighborsWhat’s Behind the Rise in Serious Injuries on New York City’s Streets?NYC Warns of 17% Drop in Foreign Tourists Due to Trump Policie

headline: Big Tech commits $80B, ESPN streaming, Microsoft layoffs
summary: Yahoo Finance host Brad Smith tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including funding commitments by tech giants Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL), Oracle (ORCL), and Salesforce (CRM) to the US and Saudi Arabia; ESPN's standalone streaming service is set to launch this fall; and Microsoft (MSFT) is reportedly cutting 3% of its workforce. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Invesco Global Focus Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: Class A shares outperformed the MSCI ACWI Growth Index and ranked in the 66th percentile of the Morningstar Global Large Stock Growth category for the first quarter.
